query:
UPDATE pending_chat_operation
                    SET locked_by = ?1
                    WHERE group_id = (
                      SELECT group_id
                      FROM pending_chat_operation
                      WHERE (locked_by IS NULL OR locked_by != ?1)
                      AND request_status = "ready_to_retry"
                      AND retry_due_at <= ?2
                      LIMIT 1
                    )
                RETURNING
                    group_id,
                    operation_data,
                    retry_due_at AS "retry_due_at: _",
                    request_status,
                    number_of_attempts
